Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization of the city of Beacon to impose a hotel and motel tax for an additional two years
Summary: Extends the authorization of the city of Beacon to impose a hotel and motel tax for an additional two years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 295 of the laws of 2023 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the city of Beacon to impose a hotel and motel tax, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
